text.style: font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;font-weight:bold;font-stretch:normal;font-size:16px;font-family:system-ui, '-apple-system', 'Segoe UI', sans-serif;-inkscape-font-specification:'system-ui, -apple-system, Segoe UI, sans-serif, Bold';font-variant-ligatures:normal;font-variant-caps:normal;font-variant-numeric:normal;font-variant-east-asian:normal;text-align:start;writing-mode:lr-tb;direction:ltr;text-anchor:start;fill:#5f6773;fill-opacity:1;stroke:#000000;stroke-width:4.4;stroke-linejoin:round;paint-order:fill markers stroke
